markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Outrider](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=453)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 50 <sup>1.1</sup>

 

</column>

In your youth, you galloped on horseback over vast prairies, serving as a vanguard for your settlement, an army, or another group. Seeing so many different lands built a thirst in you to adventure and explore the world instead of just racing past it.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Wisdom, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) skill, and the [Plains Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Express Rider](/Feats.aspx?ID=2126) skill feat.
name: Outrider

text: Outrider Source Player Core 2 pg. 50 1.1 In your youth, you galloped on horseback over vast prairies, serving as a vanguard for your settlement, an army, or another group. Seeing so many different lands built a thirst in you to adventure and explore the world instead of just racing past it. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Nature skill, and the Plains Lore skill. You gain the Express Rider skill feat.
